qdes: \text{If A's salary is 25\% less than B's salary, by how much percent is B's salary more than A's?}
\text{Find the single discount in percentage which is equivalent to two successive discounts of 25\% and 20\% given for an article.}
\text{If the numerator of a fraction is increased by 50\% and the denominator is decreased by 20\% then it becomes }\frac{3}{5}, \text{find the original fraction.}

\begin{array}{l} \text{In a school, 30\% of the students play chess, 60\% play cricket and 15\% play both chess and cricket.} \\ \text{If 99 students do not play any of these games, find the number of students who play only chess.} \end{array}
\text{A man sold an article for Rs. 4,500 and gained 10\%. Find the cost price of the article}
